note:
Democracy Watch News, a 501c3-nonprofit news-service, covers and reports on issues, people, organizations, and events necessary to build and sustain healthy systems for democracy, self-governance, and justice around the world. We emphasize ethical, solutions, narrative, and purpose-driven journalism, combined with other “best media practices,” including collaborative media and integrated technology for the digital age, press freedom and media responsibility.
democracywatchnews.org
